title: Stream: Perfume Genius – Put Your Back N 2 It
body:
Two years in the making, **Mike Hadreas** aka **Perfume Genius** releases his sophomore album _**Put Your Back N 2 It**_ this time next week.

With this debut album **_Learning_** receiving rave reviews and lining him up with a support slot for **Beirut**, **Hadreas** adopted a more expansive sound for this new record. **Hadreas** is known for his emotionally poignant, piano led ballads, and his sincere and honest approach to his music. A promotional video featuring famed gay porn star **Arpad Miklos** for **_Put Your Back N 2 It_** caused controversy earlier in the year when some advertisers banned it from being shown due to ‘explicit adult themes’.

Stream _**Put Your Back N 2**_ It in it’s entirety below, which is released 21 February through Matador/Turnstile.

Via [The Guardian](http://www.guardian.co.uk/music/musicblog/2012/feb/13/perfume-genius-back-album-stream)
